{{Wired embedded system |brand=Sophos |model=SG 125 |revision=(rev 2) |manuf_country=Taiwan |is_manuf=No |manuf=Nexcom |manuf_model=DNB1150-PEX |manuf_rev=VER:B |est_release_date=11/2015 |pcb_id=4BL01150B2X10 |type=security appliance |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3.33 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.5 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Intel Atom |cpu1_model=C2358 |cpu1_cspeed=1.7 GHz |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L6406EM2I-12G |ram1=4 GiB |ram1_brand=Apacer |ram1_model=DDR3 DIMM |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, SATA 3.0 |expansion_usb_num=2 |expansion_sata_num=1 |serial=yes,, console port,, RJ45,, (38400 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1543 |eth_chip3_brand=Intel |eth_chip3_model=WGI211AT (x4) |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=7 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=LPC I/O Controller;Nuvoton;NCT6776F;;1;,,, PCIe 2D VGA Chip;ASPEED Tech;AST1300;;1;,,, 128Kbit SPI Serial EEPROM;Atmel;AT25128B;;1;,,, RS-232 Transceiver;Analog Devices;ADM213;;1;,,, FPGA;Lattice Semiconductor;LCMX02-1200UHC;;1;,,, 2Kbit I2C 2-wire Serial EEPROM;Atmel;AT24C02D;;1;,,, 128MB DDR3 SDRAM;Samsung;K4B1G1646G-BCK0;;1;,,, 30V N-Channel NexFET Power MOSFET;TI;CSD17304Q3;;2;,,, 30V N-Channel NexFET Power MOSFET;TI;CSD17505Q5A;;3;,,, Synchronous Buck NexFET Power Block;TI;CSD87330Q3D;;2;,,, Synchronous Buck NexFET Power Block;TI;CSD87350Q5D;;1;,,, 4-lane 4-port PCIe Gen2 Switch;PLX Technology;PEX8605;;2;,,, 3V-28V D-CAP Synchronous Buck Controller;TI;TPS53219A;;3;,,, 4.5-18V 3A Synchronous Step-Down Converter;TI;TPS54326;;3;,,, Four Output Differential Buffer for PCIe;Renesas;ICS9DB403D;;1;,,, 30V 18A P-Channel MOSFET;Exelliance MOS Corp;EMB20P03V;;1;,,, 50A Synchronous Buck Gate Driver;International Rectifier;IR3551;;2;,,, 40A Synchronous Buck Gate Driver;International Rectifier;IR3553;;1;,,, 2A Linear Power Low Dropout Regulator;uPI Semiconductor;uP0105;;5;,,, Dual Output 3+2 Phase PWM Controller;International Rectifier;IR3570B;;2; |flags=RTC w/ battery, VGA out, power switch, metal case, heat sink, fan |stock_os=Linux;3.12.74;Sophos UTM 9.5; |tp_firmware=pfSense, OpenWrt |default_ip=192.168.0.1 |oui_eth=00:1A:8C }} {{TagLine|Sophos SG 125 UTM Firewall}} :[https://community.sophos.com/utm-firewall Support page]
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Intel Atom]]'' Dual-Core (@1.7GHz) *Memory: 4GB DDR3 (DIMM) RAM *Storage: 8MB CMOS Serial Flash, :64GB Transcend SSD *Network: 8x Gigabit Ethernet ports *USB: 2x USB 2.0 ports *Power: 12V, 3.33A via barrel
